content.detailedDescription: i was outside looking a stars with my video camera because it has such an amazing zoom function, while looking for stars this caught my attention and i couldnt believe what was happening. the sounds were amazing and it got a little eerie once it beamed light toward me and a sound frequency ill never forget.Afterwards i can occasionally still hear the frequency and humming sounds
content.summary: An amazing lightshow, beams of light, morphing orbs and blasting off

content.detailedDescription: Sunny afternoon, beautiful blue skies, videoing my animals.  saw a flash of light in sky and this object come out of that flash and appeared to look triangle changing shape to horseshoe shape.  was beautiful to watch, noticed it was not heading in a dead straight line, more a very slight s style line.  i thought they are back.! i took some video and are happy not to upload onto cms until a mufon investigator asks.  i am happy to share with mufon.  i have been told mufon is the most trusted ufo investigation network in the world to keep identity hidden.
content.summary: Similiar object returns the next day to the previous report

content.detailedDescription: Videoing the animals on the lawn, i looked up and watched a white disc in the sky, flying overhead about 75 degrees, angled the video just in time to capture what looks like a ufo. the object quickly flew across the sky.  it didn't maintain its shape.   i was totally amazed and in awe of - did i just video a ufo?  crazy idea but that i am not.   to this day i have only shown a few, i am not happy to upload the video yet but happy to show the mufon investigators in australia the footage.  mufon people have come highly recommended to solve my video capture without my identidy being revealed as i hold a professional position.
content.summary: Ufo went overhead

content.detailedDescription: Was looking out of window to what i thought was a star, object grew bigger and brighter as it descended. pulsating, and appeared to have rotation. i observed it for quite some time, a shower of sparks came from the bottom, it stopped pulsating, grew bright white, and dissapeared like a streak of light to the north. approx 3am, lasted for perhaps 5-7 min. this was in 1995.Reported to manitoba museum.
content.summary: Object was rotating oval, pulsating light but with defined edges

content.detailedDescription: I was trimming limbs above me as i was looking up a dark triangle shaped objected of considerable proximity appeared hovering ~100' above moving slowly se it had 2 sets of wings of staggered sizes front slightly smaller than back it would rotate to its left and tip its wings every-so-often then straighten and turn towards the direction it was moving the top was extremely smooth and reflective and it appeared red in color the bottom was matte black smooth thin flat solid and about the size of a half of a car it never made a sound i videoed it hovering and tipping then it slowly moved away at the same altitude until i could not see it anymore no one else was a witness although others were around
content.summary: Silent triangle winged dark object in daylight

content.detailedDescription:
A family member had called to me while busy doing high school homework to come and see a "ufo". i had read books(is something up there? and other works)about ufo's and did believe in extra terrestrials and their crafts. that night i initially did not believe this family member because we were in harlem, n.Y. and i firmly believed that no ufo would be in harlem and that if anything they would appear over a mountainous region where the population was not heavy and near secluded power lines(electricity and magnetic forces). so i ignored the prompts to come see this object believing the family member was playing a joke. the family member began begging me to please come ans see this "ufo" as he called it. in harlem!! i thought again. i refused to look. the family member then frantically called to another family member to please come see the "ufo". the other family member went to the window where the first family member was seated and locked their eyes on "something". i observed both of them from the living-room couch i was on and observed both were very fixated on "something". i asked the second family member "is there a ufo out there?" the second member remained very fixated on whatever they were watching and only nodded in the affirmative to me but never looked at me and remained staring at whatever was in view. so, i said to myself they are both in on some type of joke on me but this was never a concerted prank before. so, i decided to play along and got up to see for myself. i looked out of the window nearest to me to their left. i observed a circular greyish metallic object turning as it moved. it was moving from north to south approximately 30 to 50 feet in diameter and 20 to 30 feet in height. this object was only approximately 100 feet or less from my position and our top floor window was on the fifth floor of our tenement building. the object was no more than 20 feet above the rooftops across the street. this object, once i observed it, made a straight line reverse after passing a few feet past the window. still turning as it moved(went). this reverse action was very smooth!!! it then stopped and hovered directly opposite me while still turning. the turning motion was not in a complete circle. i was a math and science student and clearly observed a total turning motion of approximately 315 degrees. the two family members had now ran over to the  window which i was at and began to ask me if i now believed them. i was so shocked but amazed i firmly told them to be quiet to hear from the already opened window. i immediately while observing the odd non complete circular rotations  while it was  hovering that there was no sound being made by this craft. while it was rotating, i tried peering into the four to five fluorescent like window panes. i could not see anything but the bright white light from the panes. these windows helped me gauge the turning(rotating) distances. since we were on the top floor i immediately said to my family members to let's run up to the roof for a closer look. while running to the apartment door and then to the roof door(which took less than 10 seconds), i was scared but so amazed that i just had to have a closer look at this amazing silent aircraft.
upon opening the roof door the craft would have been directly opposite the roof door but was now nowhere in our immediate view. when we searched the sky we observed a slightly tilted object rotating with windows passing the midtown area of manhattan at least five miles away. this may or may not have been the object we had just seen but i would say that with a very high probability it was the same craft. the first family member asked should we report this siting to the police or news. i quickly told the family member no because no one would ever believe that a ufo was in harlem and we would be laughing stocks or labelled crazy/lunatics. the first family member had told me he waited before calling this object a ufo because blimps also moved smoothly and slow turns but observed that this object did not turn to reverse but made a straight line reverse which was observed multiple times over at least a ten minute period which then prompted them to call me to see it and to verify his sighting.  after recently visiting the kennedy space center i would best describe this craft as an over-sized space capsule that can hover and rotate at the same time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Rotating as it went, then hovered while still rotating. white rectangular lights.

content.detailedDescription:
In the summer of 1981 i lived at [address removed/cms/jpg] mount vernon, new york. on a hot august night this is what happen.
i had just sat my 4 year old daughter on the sofa and walked to the record player to put on a song called nights over egypt by the jones girls. after placing the needle on the 45 record i walked to my window which faces the back of my building on the second floor. it was used for a parking lot and woods are behind the parking lot. unbelievable i was singing the chorus to the song "your eyes won't believe what your mind can't concieve" and suddenly i notice a light coming from the back of the woods. it took seconds to realize what it was as the lights came closer. three small child like beings that were pale the color of a light bulb with huge black wrap around eyes, a long bulb head, tiny nose which i'm not certain about and small mouth approached the wall that dropped into the parking lot. i froze in shock and my first thought was act like the curtain cause if i move from the window they will see me. so i stood there almost paralyze watching as they moved slowly from the 4 inch wall into the parking lot. moving between a car they stood standing side by side and turn left to right simultaneously. then they suddenly walked to the left side of my building. once out of sight i panicked and rushed and called my friend [name removed/cms/jpg] who lived on that side of the building and told her to look out the window and check the hallway for these beings. when she came to my door to report seeing nothing i almost didn't let her in because i was afraid they were behind her forcing her to fool me to get inside my house. she said she saw nothing. the experience was a game changer spiritually. now 58 years old i told my kids, grandkids this same story over and over and warn them to one fact i know absolute. we are not alone!
content.summary: .See below

content.detailedDescription: These images submitted were captured on my iphone/ipad off an app called "weather bug" that gives details of the weather for various locations depending on what zipcode you put in. sometimes when i can't sleep, i open up weather bug and look at the "live camera feeds". depending on what your location is, they have camera feeds from all over the area. i like checking them out when i can't sleep and seeing how quite and peaceful everything looks at night. but sometimes, i see some pretty strange things. when this happens, i take a snapshot of my screen. since it is on my iphone, the images are tiny and distorted, so i'm not sure how useful they will be. following are images from last night (may 30th, 2015, around 1 a.M.) might be a plane. but the weather had been really bad, so i doubt there would have been any planes in the area. i have cropped the images and enhanced them for better viewing.
content.summary: Images captured on a live feed video cam. was not present personally

content.detailedDescription: I just had gotten off work in new philadelphia around 5:30pm and was driving home to newcomerstown  on interstate 77 south in october of 2012. i was a few miles south of new philadelphia when i noticed a cigar shaped craft flying parallel to the interstate.  it was between 30°and 40° of elevation and stayed between my 10 o'clock and 11 o'clock during my entire observation.  it was about 2 inches long and about 1/2 inch high from my advantage point.  it had no wings that i could see, i rolled down my window to see if i could hear an engine, i couldn't, and there was no jet trail left behind in its flight path so i knew it wasn't an airplane or jet almost immediately.  it stayed in roughly the same position from me for the next ten to fifteen miles until the newcomerstown exit.  i couldn't tell how high the object was until it flew over some clouds that were either altocumulus or cirrocumulus in rows. it was at that point i knew it had to be very large.  i once lost sight of it due to the terrain, but picked it up right where it should have been if it hadn't changed its course. i felt exhilarated the entire time because i seeing something i couldn't explain what it was.
content.summary: Watched ufo flying south along interstate 77 after work going home

content.detailedDescription: I was changing my 4 month old daughter's diaper and my wife was looking out our back glass door at the storm clouds because we've been having some pretty crazy storms today and it's finally started clearing up, so there had been a really interesting pinkish color because it was close to dusk. my wife (who 100% does not believe in any ufo phenomenon whatsoever) says " hon, umm what're these?" i walk over and look out the window to see two bright reddish orange to white lights not blinking in any sequence but maybe pulsing in different colors slightly(?). i imediately stepped outside to get a better look and notice that one is in more of a straight direction while the other one seemed to veer around back toward the other one, almost looking like they were going to hit. expecting them to converge, just as they looked close, a purplish cloud cover seemed to hide the first one and then shortly the second one. it almost seemed like the cloud was following them as weird as it sounds. i stood out there waiting for another minute or so to see something else but never did, but in that minute oddly enough the little wave of cloud cover had gone and went as well. i hope this makes better sense than my writing is probably conveying. thanks!
content.summary: Two glowing lights that changed direction

content.detailedDescription: it was around 1125 pm.I was heading west on sunset ave in asbury park. i had stopped at the stop light and waited for the light to change, and has it did i started to pull away,has i did i still looked left to right, looking to my left i was about40 ft.Past the light.I saw a bright light with a swirling revolving inner that caught my eye. i pulled over next to an already parked car.No other cars were behind me at that moment.I began observing the object. i became amazed,and, fixated on this object, the one thing i was aware of was the time.During the first 5 minutes i had noticed how bright it was, but the distance of the house was about 25 ft.The object was on a second story rear roof on the right side of the house, and driveway was on that same side.The light was reflecting off the house was not has strong has the light being emitted.During this time the inside was spinning at different speeds like an emotional meter.At first the speed was very fast. after a couple of minutes it seemed comfortable with me , and began to perform. still in my van,the object began spit these small balls of energy or plasma into the same direction, has to communicate to something, somewhere.This lasted for about 2 minutes and stopped.I wanted to communicate to it. i got out of my van and very slowly walked up the driveway , i noticed the speed of the insides started spinning faster has i got closer.I was about 35 ft. away from it and i started to talk to it saying lets be friends several times, but it seemed not to respond to this. i began slowly to back away, and when i did the spinning slowed down as well.I went back in my van. i went around the block to regain my thoughts, and with a few left turns i was at the light, and looking at it again. with no traffic, i watched for about 15 minutes. finally i made a left and parked again for another few minutes. i wanted to go around again, has i drove about fifty feet a strong warm something hit me , all i said was it got me.I nstead of going around again, i went home and with no memory of this event.Two weeks later on the phone with my daughter every thing came back to me,i had explained most of what had happened to her,from about 4ft,5 aa batteries flew individually and hit me in the stomach,i left the house for a
content.summary: A bright sphere had landed on smaller sub roof of three story private home.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just stepped outside the front door of my house for a cigarette at approximately 3:30 am on thursday morning. glancing to my immediate right, i saw a very fast moving falling object. the angle of descent was approximately 40-45 degrees. 

the object was glowing white with a bluish tinge. the entire event lasted approximately 1/2 of a second. the only reason i am reporting this is because the object itself, though matching the speed, was much larger than any "falling star" i have ever seen (it was about 1/8th the size of the moon) and it had a bluish tinge. the light from the object was very bright as well and seemed to be actually emanating from it. this was unlike anything i have ever seen in the skies above baton rouge, la.

the sky was clear and there was no "trail" left behind the object nor any sign, glowing or audible, of a crash when the object disappeared behind the horizon.

seconds later, a white van with no headlights on came rushing onto my street, running a stop sign and driving in the direction of the object. as soon as the van was out of sight (2 seconds later), i heard two metallic hollow sounding crashes, as if a sledgehammer had struck the side of the van. i'm really not sure if this van had anything whatsoever to do with the object, probably not, but thought it odd because the two occurrences happened literally seconds apart from each other. 

i continued to scan the skies all the while finishing my cigarette. feeling like i was not going to see anything else, i went back inside and fell back asleep.

i have since been checking the internet to see if someone else has reported seeing something similar on the night/morning in question to no avail. apparently i was the sole witness.
content.summary: Larger that a star or

content.detailedDescription: I saw 2 craft, of a type of craft similar to the x-47b (see video link below).  the craft appeared out of nowhere in may of 2014 as i watched from the roof of a san francisco apartment building near 6th and mission. the color of the craft were different that the video of x-47b, they were kind of rosy-taupe colored and also seemed to have the ability to mirror the surrounding light effects...Kind of like a stealth covering. i could not see any seams or rivets or identity markings from a government or military group or anything like that on the bottom or sides of them. crafts both appeared to be one piece of smooth metal with no wheels or cut outs in the metal or nubs or anything appearing on the bottom of it or the sides. the wings were also different than the x-47b, it was more like a triangle shape or an elbow shape than the x-47b, but nose and wings were more rounded and sloped back from the nose out to a rounded point wingtip instead of how it is shown as angular here in this video of the x-47b. there was a small inverted triangle shape that was the 'tail' of the craft, which shape was attached by a straight angular line up to the rounded wing tips.  the tail triangle itself was very similar to the x-47b.  i was waiting to watch the sunrise about 5:30 am or so and looking to the southeast when they just appeared...Like they came through a portal from a different dimension or something...In front of and above the mountains in san francisco. the sun had not yet come up and they appeared from the southeast and flew very fast heading towards the northeast of the apartment. i was on the 6th floor (rooftop). they were not that far above me (300 ft or so) and they made no sound, even though they were traveling very fast. from where i was watching on the rooftop, the 39-story marriott marquis building is only a few blocks away. both craft flew side-by-side from their appearance until right in front of that building, not above it. one of them dropped back just slightly (30 feet?) as they passed in front of the marriott marquis and that is about where i got the best look at them, when they were directly in front of me and in front of the marriott.  they looked about 20 feet long from where i was and were very thin in height at the back and wing tips but they were thicker in the front and middle of the craft.  i am not sure if i saw a window/windshield on top of the craft as they seemed to reflect the coloring of the marriott building (which is glass at the top) as they flew near and then it front of it.  it seemed to me that the craft were aware of me and that is why one of the craft dropped back, just for a moment. the objects seemed to become invisible as they quickly blended in with the darker skies in the north above maybe angel island(?).  they seemed to be flying on a straight path from when they appeared, neither ascending or descending as they went, though their path may have been arched from the mountains to the marriott, but it seemed at the same approximately height above ground as when they appeared. it almost seemed to me like they were showing off, flying thru a large city and directly in front of apartment windows and assuming no one could see them.  for video of similar craft see the x-47b video here: [link removed/cms/jpg]
content.summary: Interdimensional craft like the x-47b drones, but not

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were driving from las cruces to el paso, about 45 min one way. half way there we saw something bright like a star shoot over the mountain and hovered. we got out of the car watched it for several minutes then there was a flash and a small object dropped down to the ground then this thing took off and shot back over the mountain out of site. this object was a couple of miles away and it made it over the mountain in a fraction of a second.  we continued our drive to el paso, had a coke then drove home. when we got home we realized we had only been gone for 45 minutes. it's impossible to drive round trip in that amount of time. our ride home was quite and we felt odd the whole way home and when we noticed the time, we felt scared. i've only told a couple of close friends about this for fear of being laughed at.
content.summary: A shape came fast over the mountain; hovered, flashed the took off back over the mountain. we lost 45 min of time

content.detailedDescription: I was at work on a construction site, after my lunch break. i happened to look up and see 3 red lights above me, very high in the sky. i called to my co-workers to look at it because they were moving slowly. they formed a triangle shape. my foreman said it looked like parachuters but they never descended. as i watched the 3 lights slowly move, other colored lights appeared out of nowhere on the periphery of the triangle. these lights were blue and others were yellow. it seems that there were 3 of each kind of light. the lights then began to form other shapes, as if they were dancing into a rhythmic formation. this went on for 5-10 minutes as the lights slowly moved about and changed positions. then the lights started to break off and move away, disappearing from site.
content.summary: Lights appearing forming shapes, disappearing

content.detailedDescription: Was standing at back door waiting for dogs in garden. area is a 'dark sky park', so little air traffic and not light polluted. star like aircraft that briefly shone beam and stayed parallel with an aircraft who was flying directly over me. checked flight radar which showed jet but nothing else. over within two mins maximum. object was clearly not an airliner and did not emit any noticeable sound. very smooth in its flight pattern. object disappeared from view due to my living on steep hillside, so over hill.
content.summary: Tracking a jet who was approximately parallel with it, moving at same speed, soundless.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a village as a guest and went outside for toilet
i was looking at the stars while doing my duty
first i thought it is an airplane but it was so fast, and this country does not have so many night flight
it was traveling straight path, and the other was too
i felt excited, wanted to make a video but first time in 3 months i was without my phone, i wanted to attract their attention but they were so far
one went so down, i lost eye contact, the other one went also far, i wanted to check online if it was satellite
content.summary: Very shiny dots were traveling in a straight line path.

content.detailedDescription:
I had two ufo experiences several days apart in october 1975 while i was living in [exact location details removed/cms/jpg] a rural area about 10 miles outside of youngstown.  my home was fairly isolated out in the country and located in the center of a wide valley rimmed by wooded hills.

the first was when my sister and her husband were driving me home from church around 9 pm and as we crested a hill before descending into the valley where my home was we saw a brightly lit cigar-shaped ufo hovering about 200-300 feet directly over my house (about ¾ mile away).  the weather was clear that night and from where we were we estimated the ufo to be about 20-30 feet long.  it glowed orange and had bright white portals which were ringed with pulsing bright gold lights.  at that distance we couldn't see if any beings were in the portals.  my brother-in-law pulled the car over to the side of the road and we watched it for about a minute before it just vanished into thin air.  it didn't take off and streak across the sky - it just vanished in place.  we couldn't believe our eyes and were all quite excited.  it was the first ufo i had seen although my father had seen several during his life.  i remember feeling apprehensive about why this ufo was hovering over my house.  when we got to my house we listened to the radio but didn't hear any new reports about a ufo.  but the next day our local tv stations reported that many people had called the police after they'd seen it.

the second ufo experience happened a couple nights later.  i was eating dinner at home around 8:30 pm when my sister burst in excitedly telling me she'd been abducted by a ufo.  she was ecstatic and said she'd been visited by extraterrestrial beings who'd communicated telepathically with her, telling her not to be afraid and that they wouldn't harm her.  they looked human.  she said she was scared to death as they took her aboard their ufo, but they were so loving and gentle that after the initial shock of seeing them all fear left her.  she asked where they came from and they took her to the ship's control room.  it was dimly lit and had a huge curved window where she could see stars whizzing by.  they showed her a star chart and one pointed to their home planet.  the next thing she knew she was back at home.  hearing her story i was so stunned i didn't know what to think.  i am a serious person by nature and knew that she could exaggerate at times, but nothing like this.  i told her maybe she'd dreamed it after we'd seen the ufo two nights earlier, but she vehemently insisted that it really happened.  

i made her sit down and eat something, and she told me again about the abduction, what a wonderful experience it had been, and how she couldn't wait to see the extraterrestrials again.  suddenly she jumped up and yelled "they're here!".  it nearly scared me to death!  she grabbed a white throw i had on the couch and ran out the back door.  i jumped up and ran after her and saw her standing there looking up at the tree line and waving that white throw around.  she was yelling "i'm here, i'm over here!"  i was afraid my sister had lost her mind.  i looked but didn't see anything.  after a few seconds all of a sudden i felt a strange inner vibration, sort of like the feeling you get when you lean against a washing machine when it's in the spin cycle.  then an enormous black ufo slowly came up over the trees towards us. i was terrified but my sister was laughing and joyfully jumping up and down.  this thing was so huge that as it passed overhead it blotted out the entire sky from one edge of the valley to the other.  i couldn't see the sides or top of it because it was so big - only the bottom was visible.  it was absolutely silent.  it was triangular in shape with very dim dark gray rotating lights at each of the three corners.  around these lights were circular gear-like things which rotated in the opposite direction.  the bottom surface was highly patterned and textured with raised designs in geometric shapes, bumps which looked like braille writing, and channels of varying lengths and widths (years later i realized that these looked like a circuit board).  i felt as if i were paralyzed as i stared up at it, although whether this was from fear or from the ufo i don't know.  but my sister was excitedly talking to this thing as if she was having a conversation with someone inside the ufo.  we watched it for what seemed like about a minute as it passed in a straight line over my house and went over the trees on the other side of the valley and disappeared from sight.  

my sister and i went back into the house and talked about the ufo for a long time.  i was still in shock and after my sister went home i fell into an uneasy sleep.  in the next couple days there were news reports of people seeing a huge ufo on the same night that we'd seen it.  i've thought about my two experiences thousands of times and always reach the same conclusion - that ufos are real.  to my knowledge my sister was never abducted again.  she married and moved away and we lost touch with each other.  

over the years the fear i felt of these ufo experiences gradually subsided.  however in the mid-1990s i had another strange experience where i felt as if i had been abducted myself, but can't be sure.  the memories i have of it are dream-like, disjointed and fragmented.  i still scan the sky at night but have not seen any other ufos.
content.summary: A huge black triangular ufo slowly flew over me blotting out the sky.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were leaving a family members wedding reception. it was around 8 in the evening . the sky was clear , it was slightly humid out as we had rain earlier in the day. toward the west the sky was streaked with the last rays of the setting sun. my husband loves taking pictures of sunsets and proceeded to take a picture of the western sky.We then proceeded home. later on that evening my husband started reviewing the pictures of the wedding and of course the sunset picture. when he saw the picture he noticed a dark spec on the left of the picture. thinking that it was lent or dirt on the lens he tried to wipe it off . when it didn,t he realized that it was in the picture and zoom it out to see. to his surprise the picture shows a elongated sliver to dark object with a whats like a slightly darker dome on top and a dark shadow on the underside. the object looks like it has some kind of white to sliver band around the middle of it. we don,t know where the object came from or where it went as we were not looking for anything in the picture when it was taken . what i can say for sure is that it's not a plane and it didn,t have any kind of trail coming from it. we have never seen anything like this before as both my husband  and i both believe that there is life on other planets . it was  very strange indeed. my husband sent his statement in along with the picture. please let us know what you think of it .Thank you , [name removed/cms/jpg]
content.summary: Husband took picture of sunset and found a object in the picture

content.detailedDescription: Thursday evening around 8:40 pm, my wife and i were outside on our deck when she noticed a bright star, she thought. wen i saw it i knew it was no star, twice the size of  a normal star. plus, in the north east sky, there were no stars of size. but, at that time, no stars were showing yet. i got my camera, canon eos t3i with 250mm stabilized lense and observed it thru that as i shot pics. it hovered motionless, looking to be several thousand feet above us. the moon was out, and the sun had just set, so the sky was dark as a background.  we both saw random red pulses of lit from top and bottom, it seemed when my flash went off, i saw a red pulse. for 20 or more minutes we watched, my wife thru binoculars. as it got dark, it turned darker with the sky, with redder tints and simply faded into the darkness. i couldn't tell if it changed elevation, but my pictures might determine that. i am anxious to have the pics looked at, we did have another sighting and photo by a pilot that day, in the direct vicinity. i didn't learn of that until friday the 29th. as we watched this orb or sphere, we both got dizzy and had one eye go fuzzy. my wife found a bug in hers and i had to set the camera down. it got better within 3 or 4 minutes. we are certain of what we witnessed, she a federal employee of 20 + years and i a quality assurance professional of 40 years, a professional observer. i wrote down the events within an hour and have copied the pictures to protect them from accidental damage. the hi resolution images are exciting.
content.summary: At dusk, my wife pointed out a bright star, it wasn't a star, none were out yet, and it wes too big. in a minute i found see it was a hovering object glowing white and pulsing red on top and bottom. i got a big camera & lens  & got 12  great pics

content.detailedDescription: El 30 de noviembre de 1996 sobre las 16:45 , sabado que lo recuerdo muy bien ,3 bolas esfericas plateadas no brillante y sin luces y sin estelas como dejan los aviones y de un tamaño considerablemente grande en comparacion con un avion comercial de pasajareros como normalmente los divisamos desde tierra fueron vistas por mi en la ciudad de gijon donde vivo , las recuerdo muy bien una velocidad increible , pero su silueta se apreciaba perfectamente sobre el cielo a una altura inferior a las de las rutas de aviones , no se si sere el unico que las vio o no la verdad es esta. la direccion o trayectoria eran de norte a sur la velocidad en comparacion calculo que unas 5 veces mas que un avion de pasajeros.
content.summary: 3 objetos cilindricos  sobre gijon no identificados

content.detailedDescription: [name removed/cms/jpg] had to take his sister to babysit approx. 12 miles from bothwell in a rural area located half way between newburry & cairo, so i went as did [name removed/cms/jpg]. we dropped off [name removed/cms/jpg] and headed home facing west. we came to where the paved/gravel roads intersect. directly in front of us at about a 30-45 degree angle, about 1/8 to 1/4 a mile away hovering over an open field, near a house, to its left and slightly behind it, just above tree tops was this glowing object, oval in shape about the size of a vw bug. it had a yellow or golden tinge while it got whiter, an opaque towards the centre. there was no sound during the whole incident. there was a sense of lost time, probably tunnel vision, no problems with [name removed/cms/jpg] car. i was about to say lets park and go check this out when: a beam of light same colour came down in perfect symmetrical lawyers like a cake expanding proportionally, cone fashion, to like a large disc, the gaps between these layers were proportional to the dimensions of these light layers. you could see tree's stars, between the layers. however, when that layer hit the ground it was like taking a very hot frying pan then pouring cold water on it. shards of light, same colour went everywhere, we left pronto at top speed and only once ever talked about between us, who would believe this ? i called two universality's, toronto and i think it was cal tech, talked to two physic's professors about how to create the beam thingy with light, they said it cant be done. well i know it can, seen it and i know an intelligence built this object that at the time no country on earth could build.
content.summary: It was early spring or fall, two others were with me we all saw the same thing.

content.detailedDescription: Upon leaving a wedding reception at the holiday inn  express in front royal va.  i decided to take a picture of the sunset behind  the hotel.  i took the picture and left the hotel to go home. later that night as i reviewed the pictures, i saw what appeared to be a ufo in my sunset picture.Therefore i am submitting this report.I have been watching for ufo's for years, watched reports and videos on them on t v. i became aware of mufon by watching these shows and listening to reports from other people.
content.summary: I was attending a wedding reception of  a relative of my wife. upon leaving i stopped  to take.   a picture of the su nset.  .I did not know until hours later when reviewing the pictures. i  captured   a    ufo

content.detailedDescription:
i let the dog out and looked out the window and noticed a bright red object in the eastern sky. it was unusual to me because the light was brighter and did not flash as a plane would.  when the object moved horizontally to the left at a high rate of speed and turned green, i called to my wife and as soon as she seen the object she called our son.  we all agreed this way definitely something unusual. our son tried to get a picture on his phone but was unable.



                                                           stationary red circular object was observed in the eastern sky.   after a few minutes it moved horizontally to the left at a high rate of speed then stopped and turned green.  object then zig zagged and moved back to the area it was first spotted, turning to a red color.  a few minutes passed and the object turned green and dropped out of sight.  before the object dropped, we noticed two drone planes flying past us in a northwesterly direction at a low altitude.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid red circular object which moved right to left and changed to green color, then zig zagged ane eventually dropped down out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: We were making plans out side of work to go fishing.. when my friend pointed to the sky and said what is that.... i turned thinking i would see a hawk or something.. but instead we watched 3 craft fly very slowly over the building .. like i said the lead craft were a dark grey color they seemed to have a blurry quality to them.. the craft trailing them was cube shape craft also of a very dark color black or grey.. i thought ufo of some kind my buddy thought perhaps a box kite .. the flight pattern was direct straight line and did make sense cause of the slow speed they traveled.. my feelings where amazed almost speechless. these craft never broke formation and we lost them over wooded area on the oposite side of the road.. i would guess they were they were car size roughly and altitude no more than a few hundred feet.
content.summary: Three craft flying in formation one behind the other .. 2 lead craft where roughly saucer shaped blurry dark in color dark grey or black . the trailing craft was cube shaped same coloration. i would guess they about 20 feet apart.

content.detailedDescription:
Italy rome, was smoking a cigarette
my wife saw and pointed it at me
maybe a drone, but then i saw the orbs nearby it, at the beginning the orbs just follow it, then some of then disappeared, i think that the lower one blinked red sometimes, but was too far away to be sure.
looked like moved by the wind, but the big object become stationary some times, the orbs in the beginning follow it, some disappeared, some got up.. then there was just the object alone
o lost sight cuz was leaving my point of view, i left the balcony for a few minutes and when i was back it was gone.

i have more videos, this one is the first that iv made. in this one you can see all the orbs and the ufo / object. i dont think is a drone. there was someting atatched to the big object, from time to time it disapeared or become invisible, maybe cuz the angle of view..
content.summary: 5, 6 speres folowing the big ufo over rome

content.detailedDescription: I was watching nascar and during the national anthem a white round object came down through the sky and went behind a cloud i video taped it and attached it to this application also the cameraman must have noticed it also made a point to tape it.. this is in dover delaware around noon may 31 2015
content.summary: Was watching nascar race and the round white object came down through the sky and went behind a cloud.

content.detailedDescription: I came out of the house and seen in the sky, 3 green cylinder like lights in a diagonal position then another white shaped sphere that drifted across the sky from west to east. i went back in the house and grabbed my cell phone and took some pictures of all the lights and also recorded a small video of them. they moved like they lights attached to a kite, but this was at night. the white light seem to just drift to the west of the lights and then it drifted down across the horizon from west to east, now it could have been a different light but really wasn't watching that one. my eyes were on focus on the 3 green lights. now my wife observed these lights as well and a friend of ours which took some pictures with his digital camera.
content.summary: I came out of the house and seen 3 green cylinder like lights in a diagonal position then another white sphere shaped one drift across the sky from west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
In 2010 i commuted each day to work on the 402 heading east.  in around june of that year, i began noticing several things in the sky as i was driving.  the first day i thought that it was something to do with the weather, but then on the second day i noticed these things again and at the same time of day (between 6am-7am).  they looked like squiggly lines, sort of like weird clouds.  i thought that as i continued driving that i would be able to get a closer look at them, but as i drove they didn't get any closer.  they didn't move that i could tell.  it started out that i could see about 6 or so and then near the end of the 2 weeks i noticed off to the north east that there were several other of these "lines".  i am unsure how to describe them because i have nothing to compare them to.  i pulled over 1 day and tried to get a picture of what i was seeing but it was too blurry and showed nothing.
i called my mom almost every morning to let her know that i was seeing them again.  she tried to get me to describe them as i was watching but i was unable.  i wasn't afraid but very perplexed.  
this highway is very well traveled and i often wondered why no one else was seeing this.  as quick as i started seeing these things, i stopped seeing them after about 2 weeks.
content.summary: Saw several

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mate was on the library roof messing around and we stopped sat down talking then out the corner of my eye i noticed this dim light because it was daylight but it was still very noticeable we observed it for a few minutes. when we first saw it we thought it could of been a searchlight from the town but that only goes on rarely once a month and always after dark never during the day it was as if it was bouncing in an invisible like box it was changing direction so quick defying the laws of physics then eventually after changing direction for its last time it shot off so quick we lost it me and my mate was so amazed on what we just saw and thought we cant tell anyone because they would think we where wackjobs it was like it was to real for it to be true if that makes sense.
content.summary: Dim round light changing direction as if bouncing of invisible walls
